title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A -
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - 
Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Restrictions upon Travel to the State from 
Certain States) (No. 5) (Amendment) (No. 9) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (restrictions upon travel state certain states) (no 5) (amendment) (no 9) regulation 2021

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: In these Regulations, “Principal Regulations” means the Health Act 1947
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations, “Principal Regulations” means the Health Act 1947 
(Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Restrictions upon Travel to 
the State from Certain States) (No. 5) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 135 of 2021).
text_norm: 2 regulation principal regulation mean health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (restrictions upon travel state certain states) (no 5) regulation 2021 (s.i no 135 2021)

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 3. The Schedule to the Principal Regulations is amended by the deletion of
text_raw:
3. The Schedule to the Principal Regulations is amended by the deletion of 

paragraphs 1 to 7.
text_norm: 3 schedule principal regulation amended deletion paragraph 1 7

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 4. Regulations 7C and 7E of the Principal Regulations shall no longer apply
text_raw:
4. Regulations 7C and 7E of the Principal Regulations shall no longer apply 
to a person to whom those Regulations applied immediately before the coming 
into operation of these Regulations. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 4th January, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [754] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 December, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [754]

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Restrictions upon Travel to the State from States) (No. 
5) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 135 of 2021) to remove states from the Schedule. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [754] 5
